title: Hat, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk-core thread 
Technique: embroidered in satin and stem stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Tall men's cap in brilliant yellow silk embroidered in silver floral vines. Lower edge turns up to create points over the ears, embroidered with a floral border in silver metallic thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hat, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk-core thread 
Technique: embroidered in satin and stem stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1951-105-30.
